New 200 t Telescopic Crawler Crane: SENNEBOGEN 6203 E 🏗️🆕

We are launching our new largest telecrane on crawlers yet, designed for demanding construction projects with 200 t load capacity. 💪

Infrastructure, bridge, and wind turbine construction – the robust SENNEBOGEN 6203 E handles even the heaviest precast elements and components.  It's suitable for pick-and-carry operation and tasks on uneven construction sites, enabling working at angles of up to 4°. 🚧

🏗️ Pin Boom can be telescoped up to 56.4 m and configured with various jib options, extendable up to 78 m boom length.
🔧 Easy transport in just 7 transport units & capable of fast self-assembly
📊 New SENcon Load Control for operator assistance: intuitive control system and valuable lifting data on a large, clearly organised display

📰 Read more in the press release: 
👉 https://bit.ly/3D6jm34
(All links in Instagram bio.)

🔥 See it live at bauma 2025 at the SENNEBOGEN booth!
More details: https://bauma.sennebogen.com

#TelescopicCrane #CrawlerCrane #HeavyLifting #ConstructionMachinery #Bauma2025 #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN #GreenHeartofbauma

New: SENNEBOGEN 830 E Demolition Vario Tool with Digging Boom & Bucket 🔥

The proven SENNEBOGEN 830 E Demolition machine is now becoming even more versatile with the new Vario Tool variant with two new equipment options:
🆕 Robust 12 m digging boom
🆕 1.7m³ digging bucket 

💡 Why is this important? Urban demolition projects are getting more complex, and debris recycling plus site preparation are now key tasks for modern demolition contractors.
🚧 SENNEBOGEN now goes beyond demolition and sorting: offering solutions for earthmoving and foundation work as well.
🔄 The quick-change system allows seamless switching between boom variants and attachments. One machine for multiple jobs saves you time and costs!

📰 Read more in the press release: 
👉 https://bit.ly/4kcVVFU
(All links in Instagram bio.)

💚 See this exhibit live at bauma 2025 trade fair in Munich!
Learn more here: https://bauma.sennebogen.com

#Demolition #Excavator #Abbruchbagger #Abbruch #ConstructionMachinery #HeavyEquipment #Bauma2025 #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN, the #GreenHeartofbauma

New SENNEBOGEN 360 G – The Industrial 6 t Telehandler 🆕

The SENNEBOGEN 360 G takes telehandler performance to a whole new level: With its robust steel construction it is built for demanding multi-shift operations in industrial applications and more. 🏭

💪 The best of both worlds: combining the power and Z-kinematics of a wheel loader with the agility of a telehandler. The new addition to our portfolio boosts with even faster work cycles and higher efficiency. 
🔝 Heavy lifter with a 6 t load capacity and an 8.5 m stacking height.
👷 Newly redesigned Multicab for maximum operator benefits: The cab can be raised to 4.25 m view height, providing an optimal view of trucks, containers, and the entire jobsite. 
🔇Noise & vibration protection, ergonomic controls, and an intuitive touch display ensure a fatigue-free and highly efficient workspace.
🔄 Versatile & customizable: Choose from a wide range of attachments, equipment options, and tire variants to tailor the 360 G to your needs.

📢 Learn more in the press release:
➡️ https://bit.ly/4h2hNBn
(Links in Instagram bio.)

📍 Join us at bauma Munich in April 2025 to see the 360 G at our booth!

#Sennebogen360G #Telehandler #Teleskoplader #Industrielader #Wheelloader #MaterialHandling #Bauma2025 #MOVEBIGTHINGS with #SENNEBOGEN, the #GreenHeartofBauma 💚

Introducing the New SENNEBOGEN 830 G – The Next Evolution in Material Handling! 🆕

The SENNEBOGEN 830 has been upgraded to the newest G-Series machine generation! The powerful 830 G material handler delivers enhanced efficiency, performance, and operator comfort. 

💪 Up to 17 m reach make the 830 G ideal for demanding scrap handling, recycling and timber applications.
✅ With its modular design, and various undercarriage and attachment options, SENNEBOGEN can provide you with the ideal solution for your jobsite.
🍃 Optimized for low fuel consumption, reduced emissions, and HVO capability.
👷 New Maxcab Comfort Cab: Designed for operator comfort, featuring the best view, a vibration-resistant workspace, ergonomic climate-controlled seating, and active noise cancellation.
🕹️ With SENcon Control System: The revolutionary new SENcon provides intuitive operation, individual driver profiles, real-time machine insights, remote diagnostics, and over-the-air updates.

Learn more about the 830 G in the press release: 
➡️ https://bit.ly/4b42mac
(All links in Instagram bio.)

📍 Join us at Bauma 2025 in Munich in April to see the 830 G at our booth! 

#MaterialHandling #MaterialHandler #Umschlagbagger #830G #SENcon #Bauma2025 #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN the #GreenHeartofBauma 💚

New SENcon SENNEBOGEN Machine Control System 📱🆕

Introducing our new SENcon control system: Smart, more intuitive, future-ready! Designed for operators, fleet managers, and service technicians, SENcon ensures maximum efficiency, safety, and ease of use with a range of powerful features:

🕹️ Customizable Driver Profiles: Adjust joystick settings and machine parameters for personalized comfort and precision.
💡 Intelligent Assistance Systems: Features like the Virtual Wall and load weighing increase accuracy and safety.
📊 Real-time Machine Monitoring: Get instant insights into machine performance and live diagnostics for optimal efficiency.
🔧 Remote Service Support: Diagnose issues remotely, minimize downtime, and ensure fast, targeted maintenance.
🔄 Wireless Over-the-air Software Updates: Always up to date, no on-site visits needed.
✅ Seamless Fleet Integration: Connect with SENtrack telematics system to optimize performance, maintenance, and energy efficiency.

Learn more in the press release: 
➡️ https://bit.ly/3CQFGh9
(Link in Instagram Bio.)

🔜 Stay tuned for the first SENNEBOGEN machines featuring the new SENcon! We will soon introduce the new machines for bauma 2025:
https://bauma.sennebogen.com/

#SENcon #SmartControl #MaterialHandling #FleetManagement #Automation #bauma2025 #GreenHeartofbauma #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN

Starte durch bei SENNEBOGEN! 🚀
🌍 SENNEBOGEN ist ein internationales Familienunternehmen mit über 72 Jahren Erfahrung als Ausbildungsbetrieb. Wir bilden an den Standorten Wackersdorf und Straubing in über 17 technischen und kaufmännischen Ausbildungsberufen aus.
Mehr über die Ausbildung bei SENNEBOGEN: 
➡️ https://www.sennebogen.com/ausbildung

💡Informier dich an unserem Infoabend in Straubing!
Wir stellen dir zunächst die SENNEBOGEN Maschinenfabrik vor, bevor du dich an verschiedenen Ständen individuell über all unsere Ausbildungsberufe informieren kannst. An den Ständen triffst du sowohl die zuständigen Ausbilder als auch aktuelle Auszubildende, die dir aus erster Hand berichten können. Wir freuen uns auf Deinen Besuch! 👋

🗓️ Am Mittwoch, 26.02.2025
📍 in der SENNEBOGEN Akademie: Sennebogenstr. 8, 94315 Straubing Sand / Hafen 
➡️ Website: https://www.sennebogen.com/karriere/news/infoabend-fuer-eltern-und-schueler

(Links in Instagram Bio.)

#Ausbildung #Straubing #Karriere #Azubi #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN

𝗚𝗲𝘁 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗱𝘆 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗯𝗮𝘂𝗺𝗮 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟱 - 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗦𝗘𝗡𝗡𝗘𝗕𝗢𝗚𝗘𝗡! 🙌

From 𝗔𝗽𝗿𝗶𝗹 𝟳–𝟭𝟯, 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟱, Messe Munich will once again host the world's leading trade fair for construction machinery, attracting thousands of visitors. 🚜

💚 For decades, SENNEBOGEN has been a central part of bauma, and we’ll be there again this year! As a family-owned company with Bavarian hospitality and heartfelt values, our booth with its green machines has become an integral part of the fair, known as the "𝗚𝗿𝗲𝗲𝗻 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝗯𝗮𝘂𝗺𝗮".

🚀 We will be showcasing our customer-specific material handling and crane solutions at our booth. Cutting-edge technology that combines maximum performance, efficiency, unmatched operator comfort and safety features: 𝗗𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗻 𝗯𝘆 𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆, 𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗣𝗮𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻.

🔥 Our new highlights and exhibits will be announced soon – 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝘆 𝘁𝘂𝗻𝗲𝗱! 
👉 https://bauma.sennebogen.com/

#GreenHeartofbauma bauma.official #bauma #baumamunich #bauma2025 #materialhandling #cranes with #SENNEBOGEN #MOVEBIGTHINGS

Serviceberater für SENNEBOGEN Maschinen – direkt beim Kunden im Einsatz 🛠️
Stillstandszeiten kosten Zeit und Geld – wir sorgen dafür, dass es erst gar nicht dazu kommt! Deshalb setzen wir auf starke Serviceberatung und den direkten Draht zum Kunden. Denn enge Zusammenarbeit schafft Vertrauen und macht den Unterschied. 🤝
👷 Begleite im Video die SENNEBOGEN Serviceberater von Schlüter bei ihrem Einsatz:
Sie sind beim Kunden vor Ort, prüfen Maschinen, analysieren Daten und stehen mit Rat und Tat zur Seite, damit SENNEBOGEN Maschinen zuverlässig laufen! ✅
🎥 Zur längeren Version des Videos: 
➡️ https://bit.ly/4gqQn7W

Service Consultants for SENNEBOGEN Machines – on-site with the customer 🛠️
Downtime costs time and money – we make sure it doesn’t happen in the first place! That’s why we focus on strong service consulting and direct customer communication. Close collaboration builds trust and makes the difference. 🤝
👷 Join the SENNEBOGEN service consultants from Schlüter on their mission:
They are on-site with customers, inspecting machines, analyzing data, and providing hands-on support to keep SENNEBOGEN machines running reliably! ✅
🎥 Watch the full version of the video here: 
➡️ https://bit.ly/4gqQn7W

🌿 SENNEBOGEN 825 E Electric: Efficiency Meets Sustainability in Timber Logistics ⚡

At VMG Group’s state-of-the-art veneer plant in Lithuania, sustainability is a top priority. That’s why they chose the SENNEBOGEN 825 E electric material handler: With its low emissions its is a perfect match for their eco-friendly production strategy. 🌍

The 825 E, supported by SENNEBOGEN’s sales and service partner ScanBalt Crane, has proven to be an indispensable part of the production processes, loading logs efficiently from the conditioning line.

✅ High performance with tailored grab technology.
✅ Elevating cab: Maximum visibility for precision and safety
✅ Reduced energy costs

💡 Read more in the jobsite report: 
➡️ https://bit.ly/4hef0pj
Link in bio.

Efficient Waste Management with the SENNEBOGEN 355 E Telehandler ♻️

The SENNEBOGEN 355 E Telehandler of the Donau-Wald waste management association delivers exceptional performance at the Passau-Hellersberg disposal center! ✅ Under tight schedules, working 4–5 hours a day, it handles paper and bulky household waste and loads it into trucks.
👷Werner Reh operates the 355 E on a daily basis and reports: "We are very happy with the vehicle!"

Why it stands out:
🚛 Elevating cab: Operators benefit from an optimal view over the work environment and can look into the loading trucks.
💪 High-capacity hold-down bucket: The attachment is ideal for efficiently handling loose waste material with its high filling volume of up to 1,400 kg/m³.
🛠️ Reliable SENNEBOGEN service: 💬 "There was always someone available or even on-site if there was a problem."

Read more in the jobsite report: 
👉 https://bit.ly/4h4j9MC
(Link in Instagram Bio.)

#Telehandler #Teleskoplader #WasteManagement #Recycling #MaterialHandling #Passau #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN

Special Civil Engineering: 40 Years of Partnership between ABI Group & SENNEBOGEN 👏
In 1984, a success story began when SENNEBOGEN and ABI GmbH joined forces to create innovative solutions for special civil engineering applications. 🏗️ 
Over the past 40 years, this collaboration has shaped the market, delivering customized, efficient machinery that sets global standards. 
💬 "The number of solutions we have implemented together speaks for the great success of this partnership," emphasized managing director Erich Sennebogen during the anniversary celebration. 
🤝 Both companies are looking to the future with confidence, ready to tackle new challenges and opportunities together. 

Spezialtiefbau: 40 Jahre Partnerschaft zwischen ABI Group und SENNEBOGEN 👏
Im Jahr 1984 begann eine Erfolgsgeschichte, als SENNEBOGEN und die ABI GmbH ihre Kräfte bündelten, um innovative Lösungen für Anwendungen im Spezialtiefbau zu schaffen. 🏗️ 
In den vergangenen 40 Jahren hat diese Zusammenarbeit den Markt geprägt und kundenorientierte, effiziente Maschinen geliefert, die weltweit Maßstäbe setzen.
💬 „Die Anzahl der Lösungen, die wir gemeinsam realisiert haben, zeugt vom großen Erfolg dieser Konstellation“, betonte Geschäftsführer Erich Sennebogen anlässlich der Jubiläumsfeier.
🤝 Beide Unternehmen blicken zuversichtlich in die Zukunft und sind bereit, neue Herausforderungen und Chancen gemeinsam anzugehen.

Read more here / Mehr dazu hier: 
➡️ https://bit.ly/4h4OC15
(Link in Instagram Bio.)

#Engineering #CivilEngineering #Tiefbau #Spezialtiefbau #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN with abi_spezialtiefbaumaschinen

Sustainable and Cost-Efficient SENNEBOGEN Machine Transport via Water Route 🌍⚓

Our recent shipment of eight large SENNEBOGEN machines from Straubing to South Carolina via eco-friendly waterway marks another step toward sustainable logistics at SENNEBOGEN. 🍃

A total of 700 tons of machinery was loaded onto barges at the port of Straubing. 🚢 Among them were the powerful SENNEBOGEN 855 and 870 material handlers, weighing between 70 and 105 tons. The complex loading process involved precise tandem lifts, performed with a SENNEBOGEN 5500 E Crawler Crane, working in tandem with another crane.

The machines are now traveling via inland and ocean vessels to their final destination in Charleston, South Carolina. 🇺🇸 This water route cuts CO₂ emissions by 75%, saving 49 tons compared to road transport. ✅

Read more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3WvwUeZ
(Link in Instagram Bio.)

#HeavyLifting #GreenLogistics #Sustainable #Sustainability #Nachhaltigkeit #CrawlerCrane #Raupenkran #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN with hafen.straubing.sand & sennebogen.na

Over 10,000 Possible Configurations: BIG SENNEBOGEN Material Handlers 💪

This SENNEBOGEN 885 G port material handler is a good example for our strength in customization: equipped with rail gantry, electric drive, quick coupler, and spreader, it handles containers in a Norwegian port with highest efficiency. 🚢

✅ Thanks to SENNEBOGEN's modular system, we offer over 10,000 configuration possibilities: From different drive solutions and undercarriage designs to boom and attachments. We help our customers find the perfect setup for their specific needs.

💬 “If you configure these things correctly together, you can achieve permanently lower operating costs and also a higher handling capacity,” explains managing director Erich Sennebogen. 

Read his interview here: 
➡️ https://bit.ly/4geBWVf
(Link in Instagram Bio.)

#Hafenumschlag #Umschlagbagger #materialhandler #porthandling #customization #norway #SENNEBOGEN #MOVEBIGTHINGS

On Track for Efficiency: Electric SENNEBOGEN 830 E Material Handler on Rail Undercarriage⚡

RESAG Recycling und Sortierwerk Bern AG has elevated their operations with a new electric SENNEBOGEN 830 E. ♻️ Powered by an efficient 132 kW electric engine, the machine ensures a quiet, low-vibration, and emission-free environment – ideal for indoor operations. 🔇

💬 "In the closed hall, this is particularly important for a pleasant and healthy working environment for our employees," explains René Schneider, Managing Director.

Delivered by our partner Kuhn Schweiz, the material handler is mounted on a customized rail undercarriage. 🛤️ 
Its curved "banana" attachment provides an extended reach for waste sorting and loading tasks. 🍌

In addition to the 830 E, the sorting plant uses a mobile SENNEBOGEN 825 E, which mainly supports the company in wood processing - the purchase of a second model is already being planned.

💡Read the full jobsite report: 
➡️ https://bit.ly/3C0g2WS
(Link in Instagram bio.)

#Recycling #MaterialHandling #Sustainable #Electric #Materialhandler #Umschlagbagger #Elektrobagger #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN with kuhn_schweiz_ag

❄️🌲 Winter Ready with the SENNEBOGEN Tree Care Handlers! 🌲❄️

When the snow falls and tree care gets tricky, the SENNEBOGEN 718 E steps up! Whether you’re clearing icy roadsides, maintaining trees on slopes or between buildings, or even harvesting energy wood, this machine delivers precision and efficiency in even the toughest conditions. And safety is our BIGGEST concern ⚠️

✨ Why Choose the 718 E?

💚 Compact Power: Ideal for narrow spaces and urban areas.
💚 13-Meter Reach: Perfect for focused, controlled operations.
💚 Winter Comfort: Heated, ergonomic cab keeps operators warm and productive.

👉 Learn more: www.sennebogen.com/718

Restoration of historic SENNEBOGEN machines - former apprentice project with a success story 🔧
Our employees Andreas and Alois started their career at SENNEBOGEN with an extraordinary project: the restoration of historical machines for the opening of the Erich Sennebogen Museum in 2014. ✨ 
One of these machines was a SENNEBOGEN S 802 rope excavator, in production between 1958 and 1960. After so many decades, the wear and tear of time had taken a heavy toll on the machine, which had to be dismantled and painstakingly restored. Alongside other historical models, all restored to their former glory, it is a witness to the development of mechanical engineering in our company's history. 👏
Ten years after the museum opened, Andreas and Alois are still part of our team and have made impressive careers since then. 🚀
💡Read more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3Assyxo

Restaurierung historischer SENNEBOGEN Maschinen - ehemaliges Azubiprojekt mit Erfolgsgeschichte 🔧
Unsere Mitarbeiter Andreas und Alois starteten ihre Karriere bei SENNEBOGEN mit einem außergewöhnlichen Projekt: der Restaurierung historischer Maschinen zur Eröffnung des Erich Sennebogen Museums um 2014. ✨ 
Eine dieser Maschinen war ein SENNEBOGEN S 802 Seilbagger, in Produktion zwischen 1958 und 1960. Nach so vielen Jahrzehnten hatte der Zahn der Zeit stark an der Maschine genagt, welche  zerlegt und in mühevoller Detailarbeit restauriert werden musste. Im Museum in Straubing zeugt sie seit der Aufbereitung in neuer Pracht neben anderen historischen Modellen von der Entwicklung des Maschinenbaus in der Unternehmensgeschichte. 👏
Auch Andreas und Alois sind zehn Jahre nach Museumseröffnung immer noch Teil unseres Teams und haben seitdem beeindruckende Karrieren gemacht. 🚀
💡Lies hier mehr: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3Assyxo

#Karriere #Straubing #Maschinenbau #Seilbagger #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN

The New SENNEBOGEN 830 G Material Handler 🆕

More power, more efficiency, more comfort: As an evolution of the proven SENNEBOGEN 830 E, the versatile 830 G material handler sets new standards in scrap, timber and recycling material handling. 
💪 The G-Series stands out with robust components and an intelligent machine design and ensures high performance at more efficiency. Refueling with alternative fuels like HVO is now also possible.
👷The redesigned Maxcab comfort cab offers the best all-round visibility, while the new SENcon control system enables more precise control, personalized operating options and remote maintenance possibilities.

The New SENNEBOGEN 360 G Telehandler – Built for Operator Comfort and Performance 🆕

The new SENNEBOGEN 360 G 6 t Telehandler, launched for bauma 2025, is designed for performance in industrial applications. A key focus during development was creating a workspace for operators that guarantees maximum productivity, even in demanding, continuous operation. 👷 

Test operators were particularly impressed by the optimal visibility, ergonomics, and smooth handling of the 360 G:
👀 Elevating cab with 4.25 m view height for a clear view into trucks, containers, and over the entire jobsite
💺 Comfort cab with ergonomic controls, noise & vibration protection, and air-conditioning for a productive work environment

💡 Learn more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/4h2hNBn

📍 See the machine live at bauma Munich in April 2025 at our SENNEBOGEN booth: https://bauma.sennebogen.com/

New in the G-Series: The SENNEBOGEN 850 G Hybrid 🆕

The versatile SENNEBOGEN 850 G material handler has been relaunched in the G-series, now featuring the innovative Green Hybrid energy recovery system, the new Maxcab Comfort Cab, and the intelligent SENcon control system.

💪 Designed for demanding steel scrap and even port handling – with an operating weight from 62 tons and reaches up to 21 m.
🍃The Green Hybrid system reduces fuel consumption by up to 30%, cutting costs and saving 22 tons of CO₂ per year.
✅ Modular design: with various undercarriage and equipment options - customized for your application!
 👷 Next-level comfort: The new Maxcab Comfort Cab offers improved visibility, an ergonomic design, and the advanced SENcon control system for intuitive operation and remote diagnostics.

Learn more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3FxQH7N

📍 See the 850 G live at bauma 2025 in Munich – outdoor area FM.712!
More info here: https://bauma.sennebogen.com/

(Links in Instagram bio.)
